item.title: Second Mixer on 3/6: 'I'm not like other COS majors'
item.description:
Â ATTENTIONÂ COSÂ DEPARTMENTÂ !!

REGISTERÂ HERE:Â https://forms.gle/fYjsSWy1xVWGNdGu9

ForÂ THIS MONDAY’S MARCH 6THÂ COSÂ mixerÂ and boba social!

EVERYONE IS WELCOME!

COME MEET FELLOWÂ COSÂ PROFESSORS, STAFF, POSTDOCS, GRAD

AND UNDERGRAD STUDENTS IN

**THE FRIEND CONVOCATION ROOMÂ @ 4 30 PMÂ **

There will be a group activity calledÂ **“I’mÂ notÂ likeÂ otherÂ COSÂ majors”Â **focussed on interdisciplinary interests in computer science, opening up room for engaging social interactions.
**Check out how the lastÂ mixerÂ went on this website:Â **mixer**.cs.princeton.edu**

SEE YOU THERE!

item.title: First COS Undergraduate Mixer a Success!
item.description: Thank you so much and see you next month!
